data.title: Chinese schools offer ‘embodied intelligence’ courses to aid robotics industry
data.description: Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Zhejiang University are among seven schools that plan to offer ‘embodied intelligence’ as a new major.
data.keywords: UBTech Robotics, China, BYD, Unitree, Lu Cewu, Embodied intelligence, US, AI, Beijing Institute of Technology, Zhejiang University, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Beijing, Chinese universities, Huawei Technologies, Deep Robotics
